text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide de.gematik.epa.medication

EPA_Medication

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://gematik.de/fhir/epa-medication/ImplementationGuide/de.gematik.epa.medication

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: Cancel Dispensation eRP
resource.description: The Cancel Dispensation eRP operation, used by the E-Rezept-Fachdienst, in the context of the ePA Medication Service, is applied to cancel or reverse information regarding the dispensation of a medication. This operation is necessary when a medication dispensation is cancelled by a pharmacist or when there is a return of the medication by the insurant. After the E-Rezept-Fachdienst performs this operation, the corresponding dispensation entry for the medication in the patient's ePA is marked as cancelled, which the goal in ensuring an accurate and up-to-date record of the patient's medication data.

resource.name: Cancel Prescription eRP
resource.description: The Cancel Prescription eRP operation is used by the E-Rezept-Fachdienst to cancel an already issued electronic prescription. This function is applied when a prescription is no longer needed for various reasons, such as changes in medication or errors in the initial issuance. After cancellation by the E-Rezept-Fachdienst, this information is transmitted to the ePA Medication Service, where the prescription is calculations. It can then no longer be used for dispensing medication. This process ensures accuracy and safety in the management of medications.

resource.name: DrugCategoryExtension
resource.description: Extension for indicating the medication category.

resource.name: EPA Capability Statement für Clients des ePA Medication Service
resource.description: Dieses Capability Statement legt die Anforderungen an ePA Clients fest, die den Medication Service der verwenden. Es definiert die unterstützten Interaktionen, erforderliche HTTP Header sowie erwartete Status Codes.

resource.name: EPA CapabilityStatement für den the Medication Service
resource.description: EPA CapabilityStatement für den the Medication Service

resource.name: EPA Medication
resource.description: Defines the medication resource for the Medication Service in the ePA system.

resource.name: EPA Medication PZN Ingredient
resource.description: Defines the medication resource for a PZN ingredient of a compounding medication for the Medication Service in the ePA system. These profiles are intended to inherit from EPAMedication, but due to tooling issues, this inheritance cannot currently be implemented.

resource.name: EPA Medication Service Operation Outcome
resource.description: Das Operation Outcome-Profil für den Medication Service der ePA.

resource.name: EPA Medication Service Operation Outcome ValueSet
resource.description: Enthält alle Codes für das Operation Outcome des Medication Service.

resource.name: EPA Medication Service OperationOutcome Code System
resource.description: EPA Medication Service Operation Outcome Code System

resource.name: EPA MedicationDispense
resource.description: Defines the medication dispense resource for the Medication Service in the ePA system.

resource.name: EPA MedicationRequest
resource.description: Defines the medication request resource for the Medication Service in the ePA system.

resource.name: EPA Pharmaceutical Product Medication
resource.description: Defines the medication resource for a component of a 'Kombipackung' for the Medication Service in the ePA system. These profiles are intended to inherit from EPAMedication, but due to tooling issues, this inheritance cannot currently be implemented.

resource.description: Example of an Organization as to be found in gematik FHIR Directory

resource.description: Example of an Organization as to be found in gematik FHIR Directory

resource.name: ExampleParametersPractitionerDirectory
resource.description: Example of a Practitioner as to be found in gematik FHIR Directory

resource.description: Duplicate Prescription Detected in Medication Service

resource.description: Operation Not Permitted on Current Prescription Status

resource.name: ExpOperationOutcomeNotPermittedonCurrentDispensationStatus
resource.description: Operation Not Permitted on Current Dispensation Status

resource.description: Invalid Data Structure in Medication Service

resource.description: Dispensation Not Found in Medication Service

resource.description: Prescription Not Found in Medication Service

resource.name: Get Medication List
resource.description: Get a medication list

resource.name: IndicatorBVGExtension
resource.description: Indicator of whether this regulation is made in reference to the 'Bundesentschädigungsgesetz' or the 'Bundesversorgungsgesetz'.

resource.name: Medication Type
resource.description: Extension for EPAMedication types

resource.name: Medication Unique Identifier
resource.description: This unique identifier is generated within the Medication Service. It is either a hash derived from a specific set of data elements of the Medication resource or a direct repetition of a single data element. This identifier ensures the distinct identification of Medication resources across the ePA system.

resource.name: MedicationFormulationPackagingExtension
resource.description: Information on the packaging of a formulation.

resource.name: MedicationIngredientAmountExtensions
resource.description: Free-text amount of the ingredient for classical Latin notations such as "ad 100.0" or "quantum satis," including the unit.

resource.name: MedicationIngredientDarreichungsformExtension
resource.description: Dosage form of an ingredient in a formulation.

resource.name: MedicationIsVaccineExtension
resource.description: Indicator of whether this is a vaccine.

resource.name: MedicationManufacturingInstructionsExtension
resource.description: Manufacturing instructions regarding the preparation of a formulation (Subscriptio).

resource.name: MedicationPackagingSizeExtension
resource.description: Specification of the package size according to divided quantity (e.g., 100, 2x25), only appears in conjunction with "unit" (e.g., 100 Stück).

resource.name: MedicationTotalQuantityFormulationExtension
resource.description: Total quantity of the formulation (without the unit).

resource.name: MultiplePrescription
resource.description: This FHIR Extension for multiple prescriptions adds details such as repetition count and time intervals for repeated medication orders to FHIR resources.

resource.name: Provide Dispensation eRP
resource.description: The Provide Dispensation eRP operation in the ePA Medication Service is used to record information about the dispensing of medications based on an electronic prescription in the patient's record. This operation comes into play when a patient receives their medication from a pharmacy. It documents that the medication has been dispensed as per the prescription, including details like the quantity, date of dispensing, and pharmacy information. This helps maintain a comprehensive overview of the patient's medication history.

resource.name: Provide Prescription eRP
resource.description: The Provide Prescription eRP operation in the ePA MedicationService is used to add electronic prescriptions to a patient's record. These prescriptions are already made by the E-Rezept-Fachdienst. This operation does not create new patient prescriptions; it just puts the ones made by the E-Rezept-Fachdienst into the patient's ePA, making sure they are stored safely and can be easily accessed.

resource.name: RxOriginatorProcessIdentifier
resource.description: The RxOriginatorProcessIdentifier, generated within the Medication Service, links the prescriptionID from the E-Rezept-Fachdienst with the original input FHIR resource ID, facilitating accurate tracking and utilization of medication data in operational processes within digital healthcare systems.

resource.name: RxPrescriptionProcessIdentifier
resource.description: This transaction identifier is used to track medication prescription transactions between the E-Rezept-Fachdienst and the ePA. It is generated by the ePA Medication Service, ensuring a consistent and unique identification of each transaction. The identifier is composed of the PrescriptionId and the authoredOn-date of the operations parameters request, providing a robust mechanism for referencing and managing medication-related resources across systems.

resource.name: RxPrescriptionProcessIdentifierExtension
resource.description: This extension is used to track medication prescription transactions between the E-Rezept-Fachdienst and the ePA. The RxPrescriptionProcessIdentifier is generated by the ePA Medication Service and consists of the PrescriptionId and the authoredOn date of the operation parameters request. It ensures consistent referencing and management of medication-related resources across different systems.
